p: Although the outbreak mostly have started from a zoonotic transmission in a large seafood market that also traded in live wild animals, it soon became obvious that efficient person-to-person transmission was also possible. 3 The clinical spectrum of COVID-19 disease appears to be wide, ranging from asymptomatic infection, mild upper respiratory tract illness, severe viral pneumonia with respiratory failure or death. The evaluation of risk factors for the severity of the disease and possibility of death is a very important issue for prediction of the possible outcome.
